articles.content: India's largest gas firm GAIL is getting regular supplies of LNG under a long-term deal with Russia's Gazprom despite the geopolitical crisis, the firm's chairman and managing director Manoj Jain sai… [+3408 chars]

articles.title: Vedanta boss meets Bill Gates at Davos, duo bond over initial struggles as first-generation entrepreneurs - Economic Times
articles.description: Anil Agarwal said that the billionaire loves Indian food.
articles.content:
This year's World Economic Forum (WEF) was a special one for Vedanta Resources Chairman Anil Agarwal.
